column1: How do you like to spend your time?
I like a good rare steak
Micro livestock - it's the protein of the future! :-)
How do you feel about heights?
Heights are fine but not too high for me.
I hate heights! I'm scared of them (aaaaaaaaah)
What's your favorite subject in school?
Where do you feel most at home?
A cozy cabin in the forest with fire and hot chocolate
Relaxing by the pool while drinking out of a coconut
Programming a game on the computer
I never have conflicts - I'm rollin'
I bury my head in the sand
I call all my friends to back me up
I strike before they know what's hit them
I show my anger before I punch them
I manipulate people and destroy their lives
Who's your favorite Super Mario character?
And lastly - Which superpower do you wish you had?
